content: As with all other Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong, the Back Scratcher can't be upgraded, so you aren't able to increase its power, although it is already quite strong. If you need to switch your Curios item for any reason, you can do this from the Equipment menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Back_Scratcher.md', within the main section titled 'Back Scratcher'.
The content is as follows:
As with all other Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong, the Back Scratcher can't be upgraded, so you aren't able to increase its power, although it is already quite strong. If you need to switch your Curios item for any reason, you can do this from the Equipment menu.
